just because thier predictions DONT happen, does NOT mean that the voices are fake. If anyone has any experience at all in this, and to be a "critic" you MUST have experience! You cannot disclaim that which you have NO knowledge! Other wise NO ONE will listen to you! The spirits like to play with people and give incorrect information sometimes. Doesnt mean that the voices are fake all together, get a new job to discriminate against, something you have knowlege in, perhaps, idiotism, or people who ride short busses.com, or how about debunkers who debunk debunkers.com ? 
  Those voices are clear and describe specifc events, get a clue! There NOT fake!
  amy
